item.title: Welcome
item.description: Hello World! Welcome to my blog, where I will share my knowledge and experiences building reliable infrastructure, solving coding problems and navigating the tech and gaming industry. I hope you are able to benefit from my experience and I hope to help you solve a problem or two in your journey.

item.title: About me
item.description: I’m a Devops Engineer in New York City, working at Crystal Dynamics with the Square-Enix West Online Infrastructure Division team. I am very passionate about automating the management and reliability of infrastructure. Leveraging tools ranging from Kubernetes,Terraform, Ansible I aim to build a robust cloud platform for my developers. When not coding and solving infrastruture related problems, I love partner dancing and biking with my local club.
